â€œPersonally my favorite strain, Bubba Kush (BK) delivers a high unparalleled to most other strains. At first glance, BK is marvelous to look at. With hints of puprle and deep green on the outside of the bud, it turns a beautiful white once you go deeper into the bud. The taste is very hard to describe, but just think of tasting the air of a sugar cane field in a pinewood forest. The feeling hits you within 2 tokes, wh...â€

â€œWas completely edgy and stressed when I picked up. I finally finished it off and even afterward I feel wonderful. All the stress I had is gone, its just RUINED the part of my brain that overthinks things. I was bordering on neurotic but this ganja fixed it.

Another really great note: you can keep cheifing without feeling like shit. I'm not a very high tolerance smoker, probably near midway. Didn't green out, didn'...â€

â€œI think this one may be my favorite thus far. It provides good mental stimulation and physical relaxation. I'm always interested in strains that promote sleep and this one fits the bill. It's also good for recreational activities such as movies or music. My wife tells me this strain produces a much stronger odor compared to others, so I tend to vape instead of smoke it when stealth is desired. But the buzz is very pl...â€

â€œFirst time I smoked Bubba Kush, it was stress relieving.. kind of subtle.
second time I underestimated it, smoked too much and felt couchlocked with a mild 3/10 anxiety for about 10 minutes, I ate soup crackers while my brains mocked me and my head felt smushed in a zone yet super focused... this strain can seriously wack you out while at the same time enhancing your focus to a pinpoint... probably good for sex and ...â€

â€œHave fun with this one, one joint of this particularly sticky bud will leave you inevitably couchlocked for at least 3 hours. Music and some HD trippy visuals on a TV make the experience one of a kind with this incredibly powerful indica.â€
â€œA poster Child for Indica it definitely gets the job done. one full bowl of this will have you Watching tv on the couch or in bed with a smile on your faceâ€

â€œPicked up some Bubba Kush from my tested dispensary that I visit this CBN percentage came out to be 2.48% and the THC level is at 19.62%.this Bubba Kush is particularly very heavy on the dry mouth taste of Cherrywood and earth tones I would say that this is a very very very heavy strain if you're looking for pain killer to the max and if you have a very hard time sleeping but would cost usually has a high CBN amount....â€

â€œabsolutely love this strain, I get easily stressed out and have troubles sleeping but with this strain I had zero stress and was always relaxed. With this strain I never got paranoid and was always in a happy mood. 10/10â€
â€œStarted out with an uplifting head high then settled in for a relaxing  body high that tucked me in for a good nights sleep :)â€

â€œI had the bubba Skywalker and was I impressed up,down, sideways and all around. one of the fruitiest best mind and body highs. Intensity just above average great for pain and getting to your relaxation realm.â€
â€œI suffer from heavy depression and anxiety and this strain was enjoyable to smoke. It has a nice euphoric high that just makes me feel good.â€

â€œFew strains are as notorious as bubba Kush. Sweet and powerful, the taste and high of bubba will become one of your favourites. Don't look past this gem, few strains are in such high demand. One of the main attributes of this strain is that it is easy to grow so finding high quality bubba is easier than most other. Enjoy responsiblyâ€
â€œGood stuff one of my favorite indicas.â€

â€œWhat is there to say about this legendary strain that hasn't already been said. This is as good as it gets. This is why we consume cannabis in the first place. Euphoria and relaxation without the couch-lock. My all-time favorite indica.â€

column3: â€œVery great indica but definitely just for taking it easy. Also just to warn you this shit will give you the munchies like none other. I ate 4 fucking hot pockets and still was hungry. These boat times are hungry times!â€

â€œHardcore indica, I would not use this during the day if you have things you need to accomplish. The head high is short lived and quickly turns into a heavy sedated body high. This is one of my personal nighttime strains.â€

â€œGot this strain from a dispensary in Denver. This strain somehow managed to provide an Indica type high without any heavy stone; extremely brilliant for a functional high that is not overwhelming like a Sativa. I would imagine this would be great for depression and ADD. I could easily read a book while high on this strain but in a good way as the high is not too weak just very functional. Leaves short term memory int...â€

â€œa top 5 strain for me.  I just picked up some flower last week that I couldn't believe, it came from Virginia farms in Washington,  and the THCA was brace yourself 38.6%. This plant gets stronger ever time I see it.  It has that classic kush flavor and despite being smooth it will punch you straight in the face.  Nice relaxing body high,  great for blocking pain and knocking you out for the night in the best possible...â€

â€œI had trouble picking between 4 stars & 4 1/2 because this is an exceptional indica. If you're a newbie or have a low tolerance you might pass out. This bud gets you stoned! I had an oz of it (I never write a review until I've smoked an oz of it) and it was such good bud I smoked it (well w one other person) in 10 days. I had planned for it to last @ least for 2 weeks! 
It's great for pain, insomnia and lack of appit...â€

â€œTastes sweet. Dense buds. Has purple and green color. Nice indica calm. Very good vibes from Bubba Kush.â€

â€œLike a good punch to the brain. One of the most, if not the most potent strain I've ever tried. This brings on a full mind & body stone immediately. All pain alleviated and insomnia cured. â€œMedicinally: This is a very high-quality medicine that will knock out even the caffein addict. Perfect for those who have trouble falling/staying asleep. Also great for relieving aches and pains of any sort; in other words, perfect for winding down after a long-day's work.

Recreationally: If you are looking for a long night in with the bros, this is the one. It makes music sound better, food taste better, bad tele...â€

â€œHonestly this has to be in my Top 3 indica strains. If we're being honest, it's probably in my top 5 overall strains. Beautiful aroma and the taste is very satisfying too the palette. â€œOne of the most popular indica strains around, Bubba Kush packs a punch. It's effects come on within minutes and can continue to build. For me personally Bubba Kush, or 'BK', has always been very consistent. I know that I'm getting a strain that is going...â€

â€œOh, how there is nothing like a thick, chewy indica for its narcotic effects and body buzz.  I've had Bubba Kush before, and loved it and my current batch (from Fusion - a great access point) is high quality and thoroughly enjoyable.  To me it's almost as good as Hindu Kush.  Almost, but not quite.  Still, it's a close second and a good substitute if Hindu Kush isn't available. 

The taste isn't particularly lovely...â€

â€œLove this one. If u need to relax and unwind after a long ass day of work Bubba is for u. So chill. If u and ur wife are arguing and u never want to speak to her again this strain will make u remember how much u love her and need her. Very introspective strain. I love it. I cldnt ask for a better strain. The buds are Super Dense and busts up fabulously to roll hog legs. Have fun and keep smoking.â€

â€œBlue-ish bud, earthy and slightly sweet taste. When smoked on its own very heavy narcotic effects, nice body buzz, and definitely makes you stupid. As someone who prefers sativa this isn't my favourite but it's not a bad choice if you're looking to kick back in the evening.â€

â€œDefinitely a bed time go-to. Relaxing, pain relief, and sedating effects that have eased me to sleep much better than any sleep aids, prescription or not. Much like Brother's kush but seems to pack a bit more of a punch. One of my favorite indicas!â€
â€œSmoked a j of this, sat in my chair laughing to myself...shortly after i was past out with food in my mouth...good for bed time tokes !â€
